name: WalkingOrAmbulationLocomotionADLIADL
title: Walking or ambulation/locomotion (ADL/IADL)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values addresses terms representing an observation of walking/ambulation/locomotion (ADL/IADL) ability.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this set of values is to identify patients who have a/an assessment of the person's ability to walk/ambulate/locomote as an ADL/IADL.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes LOINC codes for Walking or ambulation/locomotion (ADL/IADL).),(Exclusion Criteria: Terms not representative of observable encoded terms that may have values indicating Walking or ambulation/locomotion (ADL/IADL).)
